blog.name: the-headmistress
blog.title: Have a biscuit, Potter.
blog.description:
Before we start the festivities I have a few announcements for our new students: | |
1. This is a fic rec blog for drarry fics, not only for big writers but especially for new ones. | |
So if you're new to the fandom, or simply unrecognised, and need a place to get started, feel free to send me a link to your fic and I'll read it and rec it for you! | |
2. Support and love for new writers is more than welcome! If you don't like what you read, click back—that's why we have the button—and start another one. | |
3. Ship and let ship. Your kink isn't my kink and that's okay. | |
4. Stay out of the forbidden forest, every student who comes out of it alive will be sent straight back home! No exceptions! | |
(If there are too many fics sent our way it's possible we won't find the time to read them all. We are humans with a family, job and life outside the fandom so please keep that in mind.)||
Art by @llap115
http://llap115.tumblr.com

body:
New Writer!!!

Title: Pumpkins and the Moon and Back

Word count: 2.895

Author: @defluoxx

Rating: Teen And Up Audiences

Tags: Hogwarts Eighth Year, Halloween, Mutual Pining, Pumpkin carving

Summary: How pumpkin carving, a bet about a magical desk, and a peek of Draco’s tongue lead to Harry confessing his feelings for Draco Malfoy.

__________________________________________

This story is so wonderful and well written! I fell in love with them all over again!

Harry is helplessly pining and has no idea how he could tell Draco how he’s feeling but then their new muggle studies professor takes them to Hagrid’s hut to carve Pumpkins for Halloween.

This is when a friendly competition between the lot of them comes to live.

Who craves the best pumpkin?

Oh my god let me tell you, this writer is NEW to the fandom and already such a gift! There is a new something in this story that I won’t spoil but it’s such a brilliant idea and I haven’t seen that anywhere else! The boys are so well written and so in character it’s such a good read!

You see, I’m hyped. Go and read it!

blog.name: tomarrywritingprompts
blog.title: Tomarry/Harrymort Writing Prompts
blog.description: All Tomarry and Harrymort prompts and inspiration! Anyone is free to use these prompts for their work, and if you do make something, add a link in a reblog! I'll promo it!

summary: Prompt: Horcruxes and soul magic doesn't work the way Voldemort and Dumbledore assumed. Souls can be split, yes, but it doesn't...
body:
Prompt: Horcruxes and soul magic doesn’t work the way Voldemort and Dumbledore assumed. Souls can be split, yes, but it doesn’t take a murder to do it. Each kiss, hug, every little kindness and bit of affection that makes you feel warm? That’s a little bit of your soul, gifted to someone else. No big deal, because souls regrow and regenerate given time. 

This does mean, of course, that horcruxes are completely useless as far as keeping someone alive goes. They basically work the same as portraits, little snapshots of what a soul was like at the time they are made. 

This also means that the little fragment of soul in Harry’s head is slowly healing and regenerating and growing more powerful every time Harry is happy. And one day soon, Harry might have a fully healed, insanely homicidal soul hanging around in his head.

blog.name: georgeweasleysgirl

I am back baby!

Main: hattersgirlalice Sides: AbsolemsGirlKatie, unpocolocoforcoco and doyouwannabearobinson

summary:
I'm sorry if you were expecting something MORE from my post yesterday...
I have drawing prompts again for the month (after...
body:
I’m sorry if you were expecting something MORE from my post yesterday…

I have drawing prompts again for the month (after Inktober) and today’s prompt is ‘panties,’ and this is where my mind went.

I got the idea from some prints I bought from another fandom. The artist did a set of underthings based on the characters.

And don’t try to convince me that Fred and George wouldn’t do this, make underthings with their brand on them… or more…

blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: sansevieriaa
blog.title: ❤️
blog.description: Distractions keep me alive. Keeping a list of them here.

summary:
Harry Potter series
I was a generation late in being a fan of Harry Potter. The kid in me was thrilled with the fictional...
body:
Harry Potter series

I was a generation late in being a fan of Harry Potter. The kid in me was thrilled with the fictional (sadly) world of wizards and witches, while the adult in me was obsessed with JK Rowling’s writing style and sentence construction. (Sometimes I think her sentences have more personality than I do, to be honest.) Thank you to Jim Dale and Stephen Fry for the awesome voices. I never wanted it to end. Around 10 GB in my laptop will be forever yours, Harry!

Sharing the blessing with this link

All Harry Potter Movies And Audio Books (FREE ONLINE)

body:
Harry Potter Shitpost #1

*James, Sirius and Remus hanging out in the library*

Sirius: So are you going to explain why you got detention?

James: Yeah, you made us wait for a really long time and you’re not one for getting attention.

Remus: *sighs* The new teacher seems to dislike me so when I answered his question earlier, he pointed a ruler at me and said, “There’s an idiot at the end of this ruler.”

James: The teacher called you an idiot?! You?!

Sirius: And I hope, for his sake, that you attacked him or something because boii he’s gonna get it.

Remus: N-No, I actually asked, “Which end?”

Sirius:

James:

Remus: That’s why I got detention.

Sirius:

James:

James: oH MY GOD, WHO ARE YOU AND WHAT HAVE YOU DONE WITH REMUS??

Sirius: *screeches*

tags: pssssst: if you zoom in there are lots of little hidden domestic treats 👀😘
summary: harry settles himself on the sofa, a mug of firewhisky gently steaming within easy reach as he gets himself good and irritated...
caption:
harry settles himself on the sofa, a mug of firewhisky gently steaming within easy reach as he gets himself good and irritated at the prophet’s latest attempt to speculate on al and scorpius’ lives at hogwarts when the floo whooshes to life and draco steps through. he’s gorgeously dishevelled as he shrugs off his jacket and tugs his tie loose, dusting soot and floo powder off his trousers.

“hello, love- sorry i’m late. our good old minister really puts the ‘shackle’ in shacklebolt, had me chained to my desk all bloody da- oh for merlin’s sake, harry, you’re not reading that awful tripe again, are you?”

harry scowls as draco sinks onto the sofa next to him. “i can’t help it! look at this bakwaas! skeeter won’t leave the boys alone since they’ve been back. i’ve half a mind to pay their so-called offices a visit.”

draco slings an arm around harry and tugs him close, voice stern as he says, “you will do no such thing. besides, you know hermione and molly and mcgonagall will have skeeter’s head well before you do.”

harry sighs. “i know al and scorp are okay, it’s just bloody annoying that they can’t have normal lives. you know what it was like, before.”

draco’s quiet for a moment before he says softly, “i know. everything else aside, the whole normal life thing sort of went out the window when you decided to take up with a death eater-”

“former death eater,” harry interrupts. “and it’s been years since we dated- we’re married, for heaven’s sake, you’d think the world would be bored of us by now!”

“bored? of the chosen one? as if.” draco smirks and harry can’t help but roll his eyes. 

“you’re an idiot, i hope you know this.” harry says fondly, and fits himself more snugly into draco’s side. draco pulls the paper away from him, kissing harry’s temple as he murmurs, “an idiot you married- wonder what that makes y-” only to be interrupted by harry chuckling under his breath and turning to kiss him quiet.

______________________________~*~___________________________

a little domestic harry/draco as an early christmas present and thank you to the incredible harry/draco fandom. you’re all bloody excellent, and getting to chat with many of you this year on the discord server has been beyond lovely. this is especially a thank you to all the authors and artists in this fandom: what you do and what you give to us is invaluable, and i’m so grateful for each and every single one of you. i hope this little gift gives you a small something in return for all the hours of hard work you put into writing, drawing and creating all the universes in which our favourite boys fall in love over and over again. <3

(fyi: i’ve posted this well before december so that you can purchase it as a print on society6 in time for christmas, if you fancy. <3)

reblog.comment:
harry settles himself on the sofa, a mug of firewhisky gently steaming within easy reach as he gets himself good and irritated at the prophet’s latest attempt to speculate on al and scorpius’ lives at hogwarts when the floo whooshes to life and draco steps through. he’s gorgeously dishevelled as he shrugs off his jacket and tugs his tie loose, dusting soot and floo powder off his trousers.

“hello, love- sorry i’m late. our good old minister really puts the ‘shackle’ in shacklebolt, had me chained to my desk all bloody da- oh for merlin’s sake, harry, you’re not reading that awful tripe again, are you?”

harry scowls as draco sinks onto the sofa next to him. “i can’t help it! look at this bakwaas! skeeter won’t leave the boys alone since they’ve been back. i’ve half a mind to pay their so-called offices a visit.”

draco slings an arm around harry and tugs him close, voice stern as he says, “you will do no such thing. besides, you know hermione and molly and mcgonagall will have skeeter’s head well before you do.”

harry sighs. “i know al and scorp are okay, it’s just bloody annoying that they can’t have normal lives. you know what it was like, before.”

draco’s quiet for a moment before he says softly, “i know. everything else aside, the whole normal life thing sort of went out the window when you decided to take up with a death eater-”

“former death eater,” harry interrupts. “and it’s been years since we dated- we’re married, for heaven’s sake, you’d think the world would be bored of us by now!”

“bored? of the chosen one? as if.” draco smirks and harry can’t help but roll his eyes. 

“you’re an idiot, i hope you know this.” harry says fondly, and fits himself more snugly into draco’s side. draco pulls the paper away from him, kissing harry’s temple as he murmurs, “an idiot you married- wonder what that makes y-” only to be interrupted by harry chuckling under his breath and turning to kiss him quiet.

______________________________~*~___________________________

summary: like a clue of golden thread,  most excellently ravelled - Yuudan - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
title: like a clue of golden thread,  most excellently ravelled - Yuudan - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Relationships:

  • Lucius Malfoy/Narcissa Black Malfoy
  • Lucius Malfoy/his hair

Characters:

  • Death Eaters
  • Voldemort
  • Lucius’ hair - Character

Summary:

Life is difficult when the Dark power you fearfully serve and obey decides to take up residence in your home. Lucius should know - it’s been less than a year since his Manor (his poor, beautiful Manor) was appointed as the headquarters of the dark side, and it already looks like a post-apocalyptic landscape.

But the horrors of the war go far beyond devastated century-old upholstery and Mulciber’s naked body. What the Dark Lord has taken is more than his dignity, more than his freedom -

His hair, he fears, will never be the same again.

Or: Lucius Malfoy and the bad hair day (or year, rather); an account that nobody asked for.
